pages.text: Basins are a bit too simple to really be a 'Contraption'. They are, however, excellent partners. They can hold fluids or item stacks, and other machines can interact with their contents.

$(l)Automatin' Basin$()$(br2)Basins can be given a Filter setting, which specifies what recipes they will create when other machines interact with them. They can also automatically output contents to inventories, Pipes, or Belts below their sides.
